title: Weather App
description: A weather app that allows users input a city name to get the latest weather data. This project enhanced my skills in API integration and UI design.

title: Recipe Book App
description: A recipe book app that features various recipes obtained through a free recipe API. Each page refresh displays new recipes and a link to access the full recipe.

title: Dice Roll Simulator
description: The Dice Roll Simulator generates a random number on a dice and adds it to a history list with each roll. This project uses modern CSS for styling and JavaScript for functionality.

title: CSS Animation
description: A CSS animation, where a square transformed to into circles.
